mapper.select: select id,pic_url,pic_url_small from tb_scenic_area_images where scenic_area_id=#{id}

select s.*, a.id as a_id,a.area_name as a_name, c.id as c_id,c.city_name as c_name, p.id as p_id,p.pro_name as p_name from tb_scenic_area as s left join tb_address_area a on a.id= s.area_id left join tb_address_city c on c.id = a.city_id left join tb_address_province p on p.id=a.pro_id where s.scenic_name like '%${keyword}%' or s.address like '%${keyword}%' limit #{start},#{count};

select s.*, a.id as a_id,a.area_name as a_name, c.id as c_id,c.city_name as c_name, p.id as p_id,p.pro_name as p_name from tb_scenic_area as s left join tb_address_area a on a.id= s.area_id left join tb_address_city c on c.id = a.city_id left join tb_address_province p on p.id=a.pro_id where 1=1 limit #{start},#{count}

select s.*, a.id as a_id,a.area_name as a_name, c.id as c_id,c.city_name as c_name, p.id as p_id,p.pro_name as p_name from tb_scenic_area as s left join tb_address_area a on a.id= s.area_id left join tb_address_city c on c.id = a.city_id left join tb_address_province p on p.id=a.pro_id where a.id=#{area.id} limit #{start},#{count};

select s.*, a.id as a_id,a.area_name as a_name, c.id as c_id,c.city_name as c_name, p.id as p_id,p.pro_name as p_name from tb_scenic_area as s left join tb_address_area a on a.id= s.area_id left join tb_address_city c on c.id = a.city_id left join tb_address_province p on p.id=a.pro_id where c.id=#{cityId} limit #{start},#{count};

select s.*, a.id as a_id,a.area_name as a_name, c.id as c_id,c.city_name as c_name, p.id as p_id,p.pro_name as p_name from tb_scenic_area as s left join tb_address_area a on a.id= s.area_id left join tb_address_city c on c.id = a.city_id left join tb_address_province p on p.id=a.pro_id where p.id=#{proId} limit #{start},#{count};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_scenic_area_images ( scenic_area_id, pic_url_small, pic_url) values ( #{scenicArea.id}, #{picUrlSmall}, #{picUrl})
